Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō dō yasnəmca vahməmca aojasca zauuarəca āfrīnāmi uruuaraiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ pas aiwanghan gašte va barsom bist-o se tā andar barsomdān pādyāvi kardan yaʿni se bār andar āb kardan wa šostan pas barsom andar u kardan andar yašt ḫāne bordan va moḥkam nahādan pas dur āmadan

"(He should recite) two yaθā ahū vairiiō and then yasnəmca vahməmca aojasca zauuarəca āfrīnāmi uruuaraiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊. Then, the aiwanghan (should be) put around and he should the 23 twigs of the barsom, purified, on the barsomdān, that is, he should put three times under water and wash them, the he should put the barsom on it (the barsomdān)."

yaθā ahū vairiiō do yasnəmca tā āfrināmi uruuaraiiā̊ ta u aṣ̌aōnaiiā̊ bāyad ke ruy-e be suy-e vāḫtar na-bāšad čo vāǧ miḫᵛānad va čon vāǧ tamām ḫᵛāhad goftan barsom be barsomdān konad va be-ǧāy-e ḫᵛiš nahad

"He should recite two yaθā ahū vairiiō and yasnəmca until uruuaraiiā̊ and aṣ̌aōnaiiā̊. His face should not look to the East, when he says the vāǧ. When he has completed the vāǧ, he puts the barsom on the barsomdān and places it at its position."
yaθā ahū vairiiō ĪĪ do ẏasnəmca vahməmca aojasca zauuarəca afrīnāmi uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ pas avanghan cidan barsom avanghan dar barsomdān kardan

"He should recite two yaθā ahū vairiiō and then ẏasnəmca vahməmca aojasca zauuarəca afrīnāmi uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊. Afterwards, he should cut the avanghan and put the barsom and the avanghan on the barsomdān.
